text: Douglas Leonard Stevenson (April 6, 1924 â€“ November 9, 1975) was a Canadian ice hockey goaltender. Stevenson played eight games in the NHL; 4 games with the New York Rangers and 4 games with the Chicago Blackhawks. Stevenson played most of his hockey career in the Pacific Coast Hockey League with the Tacoma Rockets. He died on November 9, 1975 in Massachusetts. == Other websites == * Category:1927 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Saskatchewan Category:New Haven Ramblers players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Sportspeople from Regina, Saskatchewan Category:Eastern Hockey League players
title: Doug Stevenson
